articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Ask and you shall receive, good people of Leafly. Elected by you, this week's new strains include Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla. Read more about each variety below, and if you've come across any of these newcomers in your own strain hunting, enlighten us with a strain review. Keep the tips coming!
   1. Big Bang
Characteristics of Big Bang:

80% indica
Cross between Skunk, Northern Lights, and El Niño
Breeder: Green House Seeds
Apple, rose, and violet aroma
Possesses sedating, calming, and stress-relieving qualities
May help with pain, sleeplessness, and anxiety
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Frisian Dew
Characteristics of Frisian Dew:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Super Skunk and Purple Star
Breeder: Dutch Passion
Spicy, pine, and citrus aroma
Delivers powerfully euphoric effects and full-body relaxation
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   3. Green Poison
Characteristics of Green Poison:

70% indica
Breeder: Sweet Seeds
Fruity, floral aroma
Brings body numbness and cerebral euphoria
May help with pain, insomnia, muscle spasms, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 7 weeks

   4. Jamaican Lion
Characteristics of Jamaican Lion:

High-CBD sativa strain
Breeder: Shadrock
Sweet herbal aroma
Delivers mildly psychoactive effects as well as elevated sensory perception, focus, and creativity
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   5. Purple Gorilla
Characteristics of Purple Gorilla:

60% indica-dominant hybrid
Grape, cherry, and citrus aroma
Has relaxing, "couch-lock" effects
May help with pain, insomnia, migraines, and muscles spasms
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla

description: Purple Gorilla, named for its violet, oversized buds, is an indica-dominant hybrid that originated in the Bay Area of California. While we can’t be sure of its lineage, Purple Gorilla is said to contain 60% indica genetics, which are evident in its potent relief of pain, insomnia, migraines, and muscle spasms. Its aroma is a sweet fusion of grape, cherry, and citrus, which brings even more allure to its purple, trichome-speckled buds. Following Purple Gorilla’s 7 to 8 week flowering time, growers are rewarded with massive yields of this highly medicinal indica gem.
descriptionPlain: Purple Gorilla, named for its violet, oversized buds, is an indica-dominant hybrid that originated in the Bay Area of California. While we can’t be sure of its lineage, Purple Gorilla is said to contain 60% indica genetics, which are evident in its potent relief of pain, insomnia, migraines, and muscle spasms. Its aroma is a sweet fusion of grape, cherry, and citrus, which brings even more allure to its purple, trichome-speckled buds. Following Purple Gorilla’s 7 to 8 week flowering time, growers are rewarded with massive yields of this highly medicinal indica gem.

highlightedReviews.text: In the challenge of great purple primates, Grape Ape is the alpha, with Purple Gorilla runner-up. Not as dense but just as sticky. Tastes of earth and citrus, very   diesel / skunk / chem / pungent, no noticeable grape flavor. Good anytime medication for pain, happiness and relaxation.
RRRRRRRUH... straight 🔥....smoked out of a empire paper...smell great ...buzz...very hi.... munchie rating...hi....rating..4.5

name: Purple Gorilla
